Class Stock

  • java.lang.Object
    • Stock

  • public class Stock
extends java.lang.Object
    Stock class assigns name & symbol of a company, then compares a manually-entered closing price of stock with the manually-entered current price. Returns percent change between the two values
    Version:
    9/18/2017
    Author:
    Erik Zagarello & Kemar Golding
